name: Time Impact
description:
This game was made for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam.

The Jam theme was "on/off" and we implemented it as the ability to stop time.

Browser Note: If you're experiencing problems, please try to use Chrome.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Numpad 2468
Fire: Space or Numpad 0
Freeze Time: F or Numpad 5

Your experimental time discontinuation device is able to freeze time for 5 seconds, but it needs to recharge for 8 seconds afterwards. The time-freeze cooldown timer is indicated by the snowflake next to your health bar:

Items:

You can collect the following items:

HealthShieldFast ShotHoming Shot

Story:

It is the year 3310 and technological advancements made humanity an intergalactic species. 

You are carrying the greatest invention of mankind, the experimental time discontinuation device, but evil forces are trying to get their dirty hands on it. Now the future of the galactic empire lies in your hands!

Team:
